price: Na aliye ileta Kweli na akaithibitisha - hao ndio wachamngu.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Na wale walio ileta Haki na wakaisadiki ilipo wajia, hao ndio wachamngu kweli, wala si wengineo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī jāa bil-ṣid'qi waṣaddaqa bihi ulāika humu al-mutaqūna
